Azure PIM Role Activator
Effortlessly manage your Microsoft Azure roles with the Azure PIM Role Activator Chrome Extension. Designed for Azure administrators, this tool simplifies and automates the activation of Azure Privileged Identity Management (PIM) security roles.

Key Features

Dynamic Role Detection: Automatically scrape and display Azure PIM roles directly from your Azure portal.
Easy Activation: Select and activate roles with a single click. Set custom activation durations to fit your administrative needs.
Streamlined Workflow: Switch between direct and group roles seamlessly through an intuitive interface.
Automation for Efficiency: Save time on repetitive tasks by automating the activation process with predefined reasons and durations.
Why Choose Azure PIM Role Activator?
This extension is perfect for administrators handling daily IT tasks in Microsoft Azure Entra and the Admin Center. It simplifies complex workflows, ensuring you can focus on critical tasks.

Privacy Note
This extension does not store any data. It operates solely within your browser and Azure portal to enhance your productivity.

Start managing your Azure roles like never before. Download Azure PIM Role Activator today!
